Valentín Parera https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Valent%C3%ADn_Parera 0 Valentín Parera (15 July 1895, Granada – 5 April 1986, Madrid) was a Spanish actor who appeared in both silent and sound films in the 1920s and 1930s. He was married to the American singer and actress Grace Moore from 1931 until her death in a 1947 plane crash. Valentín_Parera ( 15_July_1895 , Granada – 5_April_1986 , Madrid ) was a_Spanish_actor who appeared in both_silent_and_sound_films in the_1920s_and_1930s . He was_married to the_American_singer_and_actress_Grace_Moore from 1931 until her_death in a_1947_plane_crash .
